data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramana, M. Venkat, Nandikar, Mayur, Gurav, R. V., Johny Kumar Tagore,, M. Sanjappa, (2013): Murdannia saddlepeakensis (Commelinaceae) - a new species from Andaman and Nicobar Islands, India. PhytoKeys 20: 9-15, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.20.3611, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.20.3611
